description: Former President Trump slammed the network that will be hosting the upcoming presidential debate, but argued that he will probably outdo his opponent anyway.
content:
Just days before the ABC News Presidential Debate, former President Trump scorched the network and some of its high-profile employees.

title: Gov. Shapiro warns 'The View' not to underestimate Trump in upcoming debate with Harris
description: Gov. Josh Shapiro told the hosts of "The View" that while they may prefer to criticize former President Trump, they must be tactically aware of his skill as a debater.
